Functions

Function(s) oms.clear_cache_request.
Request The server to clear their cache (see table oms."CacheStateDO"). The function reset the "lastConfigDate" in "PlatformConfigDO" too. The deletion should happen within a minute. example: select admin.clear_cache_request('bakery-cache-config');

FUNCTION oms.clear_cache_request ( p_cachename text ) RETURNS boolean LANGUAGE 'plpgsql' volatile;
